divs: Sighting DetailsThere were about 10 people sitting around a campfire. Someone pointed up at the sky. We all saw a light coming down from the sky like an upside down triangle. The light only lasted about 15-20 seconds then slowly faded away.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Castleton
There were no other sightings in Castleton on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: An upside down cone of light. not touching ground
